information.bccRewardsMobileDesc: Four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Each phase has different reward amounts that decrease over time.
information.bccRewardsSystemDesc: Four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Rewards decrease progressively to ensure long-term sustainability.
information.condition1: Members in layers upgrade membership levels
information.condition2: Trigger corresponding rewards based on upgrade level
information.condition3: Each layer can receive multiple rewards
information.layerRewardsDialogDesc: Comprehensive explanation of the 19-layer reward system, including eligibility rules and payout mechanisms
information.layerRewardsMobileDesc: When members in your matrix upgrade membership levels, corresponding layer rewards are triggered. 19 layers total, each layer reward amount is 100% of the corresponding level NFT price.
information.layerRewardsSystemDesc: Layer rewards are triggered by member upgrades in your downline. Layer 1 rewards are based on direct referrals but display through matrix hierarchy. Layers 2-19 follow standard matrix placement with recursive tree view up to 19 levels.
information.matrixPrincipleDesc: BEEHIVE uses a 19-layer 3×3 matrix system, with each level representing one layer in the matrix.
information.bccLockingRewardsDesc: Four-phase BCC token release system based on global member activation count
information.bccReleaseMechanismDesc: BCC tokens are automatically released when members activate any level, with amounts decreasing across four phases
information.referrerLevelInsufficient: Referrer level insufficient for instant claim
information.canClaimByUpgrading: Can claim by upgrading to required level
information.expiredRewards: After 72 hours, expired rewards roll up
information.rollsUpToQualified: Rolls up to next qualified upline member
information.ensuresNoRewardLost: Ensures no rewards are lost in the system
information.noUpgradeRollup: No upgrade within 72h → rolls up to qualified upline
information.upgradeToClainDesc: Members can upgrade during pending period to claim immediately
information.expiredReallocationDesc: System automatically redistributes expired rewards to qualified upline members
information.pending72HoursDesc: If referrer level insufficient, reward enters 72-hour pending state

1.author: Beehiveチーム

information.layerRewardsMobileDesc: 矩阵成員升級觸發層級特定獎勵
information.bccRewardsSystemDesc: 基于成員激活數量的分阶段BCC代幣釋放
information.bccRewardsMobileDesc: 通過4阶段激活系統釋放BCC代幣
information.layerRewardsDialogTitle: 層級獎勵 - 完整19層詳情
information.instantReward1Desc: 當您的等級等于層級等級時立即可領取
information.instantReward2Desc: 當您的等級等于層級等級時立即可領取
information.layerRewardsDialogDesc: 19層矩阵獎勵結構的完整分解
information.matrixStructureExplanation: 您的矩阵網絡跨越19層，每層都有獎勵觸發
information.triggerCondition1: 会員在您的矩阵中升級到相應級別
information.triggerCondition2: 您的等級必須满足該層級要求
information.triggerCondition3: 獎勵按照矩阵位置顺序分配
information.bccLockingRewardsDesc: 基于全球成員激活數量的四阶段BCC代幣釋放系統
information.bccReleaseMechanismDesc: BCC代幣在成員激活任何級別時自動釋放，金額在四個阶段中遞減
information.referrerLevelRequired: 推薦者等級 ≥ 層級等級
information.referrerLevelInsufficient: 推薦者等級不足，无法即時領取
information.canClaimByUpgrading: 可通過升級到所需級別來領取
information.rollsUpToQualified: 回滚给下一個合格的上級成員
information.ensuresNoRewardLost: 確保系統中没有獎勵丢失
information.noUpgradeRollup: 72小時內未升級 → 回滚给合格上級
information.upgradeToClainDesc: 成員可在待處理期間升級以立即領取
information.expiredReallocationDesc: 系統自動將過期獎勵重新分配给合格的上級成員
information.pending72HoursDesc: 如果推薦者等級不足，獎勵進入72小時待處理狀態
information.memberActivationDesc: 當新成員加入并激活其帳戶時
information.phaseJudgmentDesc: 系統根據總激活成員數確定當前阶段
information.phaseProgressionDesc: 隨着会員增长自動推進阶段
information.matrixDescription: 此可視化展示矩阵結構的工作原理。當您層級中的成員升級等級時，將觸發相應的層級獎勵。
information.layerRewardsDescription: 了解當矩阵中的成員升級会員等級時，層級獎勵如何運作。每個層級都有特定的資格要求和獎勵金額。
information.bccRewardsDescription: 了解基于成員激活里程碑的四阶段BCC釋放系統。獎勵逐步遞減以確保长期可持續性。
information.layerRewardsDetailTitle: 層級獎勵 - 完整指南
information.layerRewardsDetailDescription: 19層獎勵系統的全面說明，包括資格規則和支付機製。
information.matrixStructureDesc: 每個級別代表矩阵中的一層。當您層級中的成員升級其会員等級時，將根據升級的等級觸發層級獎勵。
information.triggeredByLevel: 由您第{{layer}}層中的Level {{layer}}升級觸發
information.finalLayerReward: 最终層級獎勵 - 最高收益潜力
information.levelMustEqualLayer: 您的等級必須等于層級等級才能即時領取
information.levelMustBeGreater: 您的等級必須高于層級等級
information.levelRequirementsNotMet: 如果不满足等級要求，獎勵進入待處理狀態
information.activateRequiredLevel: 激活所需等級以立即領取
information.expiredRewardsRedistribute: 過期獎勵分配给上級符合條件的成員
information.bccRewardsDetailTitle: BCC鎖倉獎勵 - 釋放時間表
information.bccRewardsDetailDescription: 基于總激活成員數的四阶段BCC釋放系統，獎勵遞減。

eligibilityRules.firstSecond: 1st & 2nd rewards: Your level must equal the layer level
eligibilityRules.thirdOnward: 3rd+ rewards: Your level must be higher than the layer level

eligibilityRules.verification: Level verification is required before reward distribution

layer1Special.title: Layer 1 Special Rules
layer1Special.firstSecond: 1st & 2nd rewards: Must be Level 1 to receive
layer1Special.thirdOnward: 3rd+ rewards: Must be Level 2+ or enter 72h pending
layer1Special.pending: Pending rewards become claimable upon upgrade within 72h
layer1Special.rollup: Expired rewards roll up to qualified higher-level members

layer2to19Standard.title: Layer 2-19 Standard Rules
layer2to19Standard.firstSecond: 1st & 2nd rewards: Level must equal or exceed layer level
layer2to19Standard.thirdOnward: 3rd+ rewards: Level must exceed layer level

layerRewardSystem.explanation: Learn how layer rewards are triggered when members upgrade their membership levels

howItWorks.description: Layer rewards are triggered when members in your downline upgrade their membership levels. Layer 1 has special logic: rewards are based on direct referrals but displayed through your matrix hierarchy with recursive tree view.
howItWorks.title: How It Works

layer1Special.title: Layer 1 Special Logic
layer1Special.description: Layer 1 rewards are based on direct referrals (not matrix placement), but the distribution and display follow your matrix hierarchy structure with recursive 19-layer member tree view from matrix_referrals_tree_view.

matrixVisualization.description: Your downline is organized in a 3×3 matrix with 19 layers
matrixVisualization.positions: Each layer has Left, Middle, and Right positions
matrixVisualization.rewards: Rewards are triggered when members in these positions upgrade
matrixVisualization.title: 3×3 Matrix Structure
matrixVisualization.animationActive: Golden nodes show active members with current upgrades
matrixVisualization.animationPending: Gray nodes represent pending or future matrix positions
matrixVisualization.animationRewards: Pulsing rings indicate members with available rewards
matrixVisualization.animationConnections: Golden lines show active connection paths in the matrix
matrixVisualization.interactiveHint: Watch the animation cycle to see how rewards flow through matrix levels!

pendingSystem.expiry: After 72 hours, unclaimed rewards roll up to eligible upline members
pendingSystem.immediate: Upgrade immediately to claim pending rewards instantly
pendingSystem.notEligible: If you don't meet level requirements, rewards enter pending status
pendingSystem.title: 72-Hour Pending System
pendingSystem.upgradeWindow: You have 72 hours to upgrade and claim the reward

rewardStructure.layer1: Layer 1 Reward: Based on direct referrals, but displayed through your matrix hierarchy with recursive 19-layer member tree view
rewardStructure.layer2: Layer 2 Reward: Triggered when your Layer 2 members upgrade to Level 2
rewardStructure.layer3: Layer 3 Reward: Triggered when your Layer 3 members upgrade to Level 3
rewardStructure.pattern: This pattern continues through all 19 layers
rewardStructure.title: Reward Structure

layerRewardSystem.subtitle: Understanding How Matrix Layer Rewards Work
